Class BucketFitness

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Fitness
public class BucketFitness
extends BaseFitness
implements Fitness

Default fitness of a configuration is number of buckets successfully matched against destination problem. If more destination problems are possible, takes the best match.
